name: FIVE HOURS
review: Sometimes you don't need to go over the top, and a half day might just do the trick. This covers from the ceremony up to the wedding breakfast, including group shot

name: TEN HOURS
review: By far the most popular choice. Typically, this starts from the bride's pre-wedding preparation and runs until the first dance. A FREE HANDMADE WOODEN USB BOX worth £165 is included in this package

name: Twelve Hours
review: For me, every wedding is a story, so I'll cover it from start to finish. When I say all day cover, this will capture the bride's pre-wedding preparation until the evening fireworks and late into the evening. A FREE HANDMADE WOODEN USB BOX worth £165 is included in this package.
